= Template Tags =

 * {{{ {$cover_articles} }}}
    Associative array of all articles in the Cover section in the current issue.
 * {{{ {$poll_question} }}}
    Question for the current poll set in the Poll Manager.
 * {{{ {$poll_r[x]} }}}
    Responses for each poll option, numbered 1-10, of the current poll.
 * {{{ {$section_name_[x]} }}}
    Section name of each section, numbered by section ID.
 * {{{ {$section_sidebar} }}}
    Value set in the Section Manager for the Cover section.
 * {{{ {$section_summary_[x]} }}}
    Associative array of the headlines in the current issue for each section, numbered by section ID.
 * {{{ {$section_url_[x]} }}}
    Section URL of each section, numbered by section ID.    
 * {{{ {$top_article_images} }}}
    Associative array of images (jpeg, gif, png) assigned to the top story.
 * {{{ {$top_article_swfs} }}}
    Associative array of Flash files (swfs) assigned to the top story.
